name: Cargo Transport Truck Driver 3D - Ultimate Offroad
name_original: Cargo Transport Truck Driver 3D - Ultimate Offroad
description:
Cargo Transport Truck Driver 3D: Extreme Offroad hill driving simulator 2016
Car transporter 3D truck simulation is a new kind of cargo trailer game where you need to load the high value racing cars on top of your car transporter loader. In this extremely fun driving and parking mania game you will be given with marvelous car to park in the container truck. Drive and load the cars carefully and move them on the trailer so they fit in perfectly within the indicated spot. Then drive the massive truck to the destination by following arrow on map while managing the load on top. These high values beautiful racing cars do not belong to you, your duty is to transport them safely. Make sure to fulfill your duty and transport these tremendous cars to the marked destinations within the given time. You have to drive truck trailer from the city towards the zig zag off roads of dangerous mountainous areas. So be careful and precise while driving this gigantic vehicle.
Features of Cargo Transport Truck Driver 3D:
• Drive with extreme safety
• Realistic driving physics
• Digital and analog speedometer
• Smooth controls and fun gameplay
• 15 exciting and challenging missions
• Amazing 3D Graphics & City Environment
• Real Experience of Driving Cargo
• Thrill of Driving on Hills, Mountains and Steep Paths
• Detailed 3d graphics optimized to run smooth on your mobile phone or tablet device
• iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices
